nrccMessages.message:
The lifts are out of order between platform 0 and the station front at Cardiff Central station.

If you think you may need assistance whilst travelling with us, you can pre-book assistance online at https://tfw.wales/info-for/passengers/accessible-travel/booking-assistance or call 03330 050 501.
The lifts are currently out of order between platforms 3 and 4 (west end) at Cardiff Central station.

A reduced Great Western Railway service is in operation between Westbury and Weymouth and also between Southampton Central and Portsmouth Harbour. Further information can be found in Status and Disruptions.
